name: Philly Cheesesteak Melt
ingredients: Frozen wafer-thin beef steaks, such as Steak-Umm or Philly Gourmet
Sliced or shredded cheese (Swiss, provolone, cheddar, etc.)

instructions.en: In a large skillet, sauté the chopped peppers, onions, and mushrooms in butter until tender. Season to taste.
Transfer sautéed vegetables to a serving bowl or casserole and keep warm.
Heat the skillet on medium-high heat.
Add the frozen steaks to the skillet. Break them into smaller pieces if desired. Cook as directed on the package; season with salt and pepper.
Add the vegetable mixture to the cooked steaks and toss together with two forks to slightly break up the meat.
Arrange each serving on a plate, top with cheese and microwave until the cheese is melted.

notes: This recipe's serving size and carb count can vary depending on the amount of ingredients used. The nutritional information provided is an estimate. This is a quick and tasty supper option.
